items.name: Bag of Stone Marbles
items.description: Each has a name and rolls towards whoever speaks it.

items.name: Block of Cheese Infected with Hallucinogenic Fungus
items.description: A block of cheese infected with hallucinogenic fungus.

items.name: Bloodstained Hat
items.description: A bloodstained hat that once belonged to a redcap.

items.name: Book of Saints' Crimes
items.description: A book alleging crimes by each of the 100 saints of Dolmenwood. Found on the body of a murdered man.

items.name: Bottle of Yeast-Froth Shampoo
items.description: Essential for maintaining the lustre of mossy manes.

items.name: Bouquet of Honeysuckle
items.description: Drips real honey. The honey attracts wasps.

items.name: Brass Cowbell
items.description: When struck, nearby milk and cheese products jump half a foot towards it.

items.name: Broad-Brimmed Hat Covered in Shimmering Moss
items.description: A broad-brimmed hat covered in shimmering moss.

items.name: Bronze Idol to a Two-Headed Mushroom God
items.description: A bronze idol to a two-headed mushroom god.

items.name: Chunk of Volcanic Rock
items.description: Warm to the touch. A single Old Woldish rune has been carved into it.

items.name: Clay Figurine of a Pot-Bellied Giant
items.description: A clay figurine of a pot-bellied giant with a single eye.

items.name: Cluster of Symbiotic Fungus
items.description: A cluster of fungus consisting of a dozen different kinds of mushrooms living in symbiosis.

items.name: Collection of Gravestone Rocks
items.description: A collection of small rocks, all chipped from different gravestones.

items.name: Mushroom-Adding Cooking Pot
items.description: A cooking pot that adds mushrooms to every dish cooked inside it.

items.name: Flower Pressed in Dead Man's Journal
items.description: A flower pressed inside a dead man's journal.

items.name: Hunting Horn from Boar Tusk
items.description: A hunting horn fashioned from a great boar tusk.

items.name: Jar of Blue Cheese Massage Oil
items.description: A jar of blue cheese massage oil.

items.name: Jar of Green Jelly
items.description: A jar of green jelly with the label "Don't Eat Me."

items.name: Large Egg from Woodgrue
items.description: A large egg, entrusted to you by a panicked woodgrue.

items.name: Large Gooseberry with Creature Inside
items.description: A large gooseberry that appears to have a creature growing inside it.

items.name: Large Pink Sausage
items.description: A large, pink sausage. Tries to crawl away if left unattended.

items.name: Seasonal Leaf
items.description: A leaf that changes with the seasons, dying by winter only to rejuvenate in spring.

items.name: Mossy Rock
items.description: When placed on the ground for at least a minute and then lifted, bugs scurry out from underneath it.

items.name: Mould-Riddled Tapestry
items.description: A mould-riddled tapestry depicting the hunt for a swine of mythic size.

items.name: Puffball with Tiny Mouths
items.description: A puffball with dozens of tiny mouths which burp in unison at dawn.

items.name: Puffball-Skin Pouch Filled with Jelly
items.description: A puffball-skin pouch filled with jelly.

items.name: Sack of Half-Empty Ale Bottles
items.description: A sack of half-empty ale bottles.

items.name: Sealed Bottle of Ancestor Spirits
items.description: A sealed bottle of spirits, brewed from the composted remains of one of your ancestors.

items.name: Shepherd's Crook
items.description: A shepherd's crook that induces fear in farm animals when brandished.

items.name: Single Hair from Elven Lady
items.description: A single hair from the head of an elven lady; a token of her affection.

items.name: Small Beetle
items.description: A small beetle you found on the road. You have since received a letter from an angry grimalkin charging you with its theft.

items.name: Small Effigy of a Breggle
items.description: A small effigy of a breggle made from dried mushroom flesh.

items.name: Small Pouch of Magic Nuts
items.description: A small pouch of magic nuts. When a nut is broken open, it emits a pearl of wisdom.

items.name: Small Snake with Return Note
items.description: A small snake with a "Return to" note attached. The owner's name is smudged out.

items.name: Small Hollow Toadstool
items.description: A small, hollow toadstool with a tiny wooden door.

items.name: Snail Shell
items.description: A snail shell that grows a new snail at dawn if the old one is removed or killed.

items.name: Squirrel-Sized Collar and Leash
items.description: A squirrel-sized collar and leash.

items.name: Story Book about Moon Rat-People
items.description: A story book about the charming exploits of the rat-people of the moon.

items.name: Unique Pipeweed Mix
items.description: A unique pipeweed mix of your own invention. A bit too combustible.

items.name: Watering Can
items.description: A watering can that constantly trickles water from its spout.

items.name: Waterskin of Yellow Slime
items.description: A waterskin of yellow slime that drips upwards when unstoppered.

items.name: Wheel of Cheese
items.description: A wheel of cheese that never loses momentum once it starts rolling.

items.name: Wooden Carving of Yourself
items.description: A wooden carving of yourself that ages as you do.

items.name: Wooden Peg Leg Fungi Incubator
items.description: A wooden peg leg that you found and converted into an incubator for rare fungi.

items.name: Prophecy Worm
items.description: A worm whose squirming slowly spells out threatening prophecies.

items.name: Adorable Red-and-White Button Mushroom
items.description: An adorable red-and-white button mushroom. Whispers to you when no one else is listening.

items.name: Incomplete Map of Dolmenwood Inns
items.description: An incomplete, and possibly inaccurate, map of all the inns in Dolmenwood.

items.name: Baby-Shaped Onion
items.description: An onion shaped like a baby.

items.name: Blueprints for Mechanical Mouse Organ Clock
items.description: Blueprints for a marvellous mechanical mouse organ clock.

items.name: Bark Book
items.description: Dozens of different kinds of bark, stitched together like a book.

_metadata.extraction_note: Review and correct this data before importing
